text: Mercy is a 2016 American thriller film written and directed by Chris Sparling. The film had its world premiere at Los Angeles Film Festival on June 4, 2016 and its distribution rights were acquired by Netflix. ==Cast== * James Wolk as Brad * Caitlin FitzGerald as Melissa * Tom Lipinski as Travis * Dan Ziskie as George * Michael Godere as Ronnie * Michael Donovan as TJ * Dion Graham as Dr. Turner * Constance Barron as Grace ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2016 films Category:2010s thriller films Category:English-language films
title: Mercy (2016 film)
